meta.title: Utsav 2026: Annual Cultural Fest | College Events
meta.description: The biggest cultural extravaganza of the year is back with dance, music, fashion, and a celebrity night from April 10-12, 2026.

about.title: About Utsav 2026
about.tagline: A Celebration of Art and Culture
description: Utsav, the annual cultural festival of our college, is back bigger and better than ever! It's a three-day extravaganza that brings together talent from across the nation for a vibrant celebration of music, dance, drama, and art.

From electrifying dance-offs and soulful musical performances to a glamorous fashion show and thought-provoking street plays, Utsav is a platform for students to express their creativity. The festival culminates in a star-studded Celebrity Night, making it an unmissable event.

highlights.title: Last Year's Celebrity Night
highlights.caption: A look back at the electrifying performance from Utsav 2025.

categories.title: Celebrity Night
categories.description: A grand finale with a star performer.

guests.name: Famous Local Band
guests.bio: A popular band known for their energetic live performances.

articles.title: Utsav 2026 is here!
articles.excerpt: The biggest cultural extravaganza of the year is back. Get your passes now!

team.title: Organizing Committee
team.joinText: Become a part of the Utsav family. Volunteer registration is now open.

questions.question: Are passes available for individual days?
questions.answer: Yes, single-day passes will be available at the venue, but the 3-day combo pass offers the best value.
